Title: Relates to eliminating rent increases for structures due to major capital improvements
Summary: Eliminates rent increases for structures due to major capital improvements in a city with a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Amd ยง6, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, in relation to eliminating rent increases for structures due to major capital improvements
